projectGridLines.stationName: Wayfair Global Technology Pvt. Ltd- GST
projectGridLines.title: Title: Software Intern (Supplier Integrations - API/EDI (Electronic Data  Interchange))
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Supplier Integrations teams are key enablers of supplier

interactions with Wayfair. Creating generic tools/frameworks for supplier

interactions via API and EDI is a complex problem needing intelligent

engineering and collaboration with multiple stakeholders. Intern will focus on

building/enhancing features to products, tools and frameworks improving team's

velocity and delivering value to Wayfair suppliers.

Skill sets: Computer Science, Programming in any popular language

(Java/python preferred), Git, Linux/Unix based operating system, SQL

Expected learning: Interns will get hands-on experience in working on real

world projects which incorporate building systems at scale, hosting APIs in GCP

(Google cloud platform), CI/CD pipelines and introduction to various aspects of

software development like planning (Sprint planning), design, testing

(Automated) and maintenance.

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Science

Fundamentals, Object Oriented Design, Operating Systems, Databases
